title: Ongoing Data Analysis
text: Our work is grounded in the question: Is the media coverage from the Palestinian and Israeli conflict in Canada biased?

title: Previous Data Visualizations
text: Doing new visualizations with data collected by others

title: Previous Reporting
text:
We are building off of work done by journalists in Canada and elsewhere. Here is a list of previously done work:

The Column: “Massacred” vs “Left to Die”
The Breach: CTV’s Double Standards

title: Canadian Media Bias in Palestine Reporting (Work in Progress)
text:
This project is inspired by reporting in the US done by The Column, as well as ongoing work in Canada that has been reported by The Breach.
We know there is bias in the Canadian media landscape, and we want to show you just how much.
The goals of this project are to have an ongoing place where you can check in and see how our journalists our doing.



Fleshed out site
Place to contribute data that you have found




We are looking for contributions/help with all aspects of this project! If you want to chat, please send us an email at bellarichmond@proton.me.
